String.string: "I...okay. But stay back until it's safe."
Kill Archdevan Lancers guarding the inside of Energia Celo.
"I'm going in—I heard prisoners in there. Stay here."
Kill Hulking Salcatas guarding the Experiment Cages.
"I understand. I'll join you when I'm finished."
Destroy the cage so that the Parthians can escape.
Enter Main Laboratory Corridor with Zolyn.
"There's nothing we can do from here. I'm sorry."
I am coming to save you, Zolyn…
Use the lever to overload the Storm Barrier machine.
